name: Stop that thief! He took my soup.
name_original: Stop that thief! He took my soup.
description:
You were enjoying some alone time with your Campbell Mushroom Soup when a thief crashed and took her away from your very hands. Bring out your magic black paintbrush and help the soup come back to you as you chase this Soup Thief. Along the way, you encounter weird and wacky soup bits, and will have to use the environment to reclaim your precious soup. now go and

STOP THAT THIEF!  He took my soup :(

Submission for the Paint Jam 2021.

Controls:

Left click to draw a path.

Ctrl + Z or undo button to undo the last drawn path.

Press R to restart the current level.

Some Help:

Click the Play buttons to start the CINEMATIC movie.

Soup undergoes three states of soupmatter. Use Lava or Ice to affect their states and change up their properties.

If you feel I've left out anything confusing, don't hesitate to comment them.
